description: LANDSCAPE-4 Beautiful, modern, spacious Villa which also includes B&B accommodation, with fabulous oceanfront position and amazing views. This villa has accommodation for up to TWENTY-ONE guests. Rent one B&B room or rent the entire villa. . Two spacious, oceanfront Family Beachfront Studios have been added to our choice of accommodation (each Family Beachfront Studio will sleep a family of up to 6 guests). We now have SIX bedrooms accommodating up to TWENTY-ONE GUESTS. . The rate of GBP65 per night (rate for 2015) is for 2 guests if renting ONE room or GBP359 for the ENTIRE VILLA/EXCLUSIVE USE (up to twelve guests). Extra guests over and above twelve are charged for at a separate, additional rate with discounted rates for children
